ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | cygctb.1 | |- B = ( Base ` G ) |
| 2 |  | cyggex.o | |- E = ( gEx ` G ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_cyggex2 | |- ( G e. CycGrp -> E = if ( B e. Fin , ( # ` B ) , 0 ) ) |
| 4 |  | #P_iftrue | |- ( B e. Fin -> if ( B e. Fin , ( # ` B ) , 0 ) = ( # ` B ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylan9eq | |- ( ( G e. CycGrp /\ B e. Fin ) -> E = ( # ` B ) ) |
